metadata.title: CVE-2022-48916 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:

paniccall trace/kernel log is shown in Eagle Stream platform (Sapphire RapidsCPU) during booting:pci 0000:59:00.5: Adding to iommu group 42...vmd 0000:59:00.5: PCI host bridge to bus 10000:80pci
